actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Saccharin Study and Labeling Act to extend for 18 months the current ban on actions by the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare respecting saccharin.

summary.text: Amends the Saccharin Study and Labeling Act to extend from 18 to 36 months the period during which the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare may not take specified actions to restrict the continued use of saccharin or of any food, drug, or cosmetic containing saccharin.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Saccharin Study and Labeling Act to extend for 18 months the current ban on actions by the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare respecting saccharin.
